channel.title: Uid error
channel.description:
ok, heres my error.
[code] client.java:5442: cannot find symbol symbol : variable UID location: class client if (UID = 87304370) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint: Deprecation for details. 1 error [/code]
I'm pretty sure it's UID though, because if i search it i can find this...
[code] misc.printIn("userId = "+UID); [/code]
so i'm damn sure it is UID, any help??
Thanks!

item.title: Uid error
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

lol…i dont know how to do this…and also a uid is userid loll

al i want is to make it so if(variableforuid? == theiruid) {
something here
}

thats basically what im tryina do, so someone help…i cant do it…some said its just if(uid == but that wont work??

HELP?!?

Read full topic

item.title: Uid error
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

Move the definition of UID into the actual class instead of inside a method.

Read full topic

item.title: Uid error
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

UID was probably a local variable. That’s your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Uid error
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

I don’t recall ever seeing a variable named “UID”.

At any rate, the problem is that it is undefined or isolated.

Read full topic

item.title: Uid error
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

ok, heres my error.

client.java:5442: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable UID
location: class client
if (UID = 87304370) {
    ^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint: Deprecation for details.
1 error

I’m pretty sure it’s UID though, because if i search it i can find this…

misc.printIn("userId = "+UID);

so i’m damn sure it is UID, any help??

Thanks!

Read full topic
